help: **!ft timezones** - View a map of available timezones.
**!ft register <timezone>** - Register yourself to a timezone.
timezones: Please visit the following link and choose your timezone:
Then enter **!ft register <timezone>** with your timezone.
noTimezoneProvided: Type **!ft timezones** to view a map of available timezones.
invalidTimezone: Type **!ft timezones** to view a map of available timezones.
